creator.description:
An account for labeling medical misinformation

ALWAYS provide examples of misinfo when reporting
ALWAYS report both to our labeler & @moderation.bsky.app
ALWAYS consult a doctor before making decisions about your health

Our Labels/Posts â‰  Medical Advice

locales.description: This user has received a label due to the dissemination of misinformation regarding vaccines. Vaccines are a safe and effective preventive treatment, and immunization currently prevents 3.5 million to 5 million deaths every year from diseases like diphtheria, tetanus, pertussis, influenza, measles, and COVID-19. Always consult a physician or other healthcare provider before making decisions regarding your health based on information you read on the internet, and always check credible health resources online prior to sharing information that may contain misinformation.
locales.name: Vaccine Misinformation

locales.description: This user has received a label due to the dissemination of medical misinformation. False or misleading medical information can cause individuals to make decisions that could have dangerous consequences for their health. Misinformation about diseases, illnesses, potential treatments and cures, vaccines, diets, and cosmetic procedures is especially harmful. Always consult a physician or other healthcare provider before making decisions regarding your health based on information you read on the internet, and always check credible health resources online prior to sharing information that may contain misinformation.
locales.name: Medical Misinformation
